author: rhuijben
msg: (open_pipe): Enable universal newlines when using subprocess.Popen on
Windows in an attempt to (at least temporary) fix the Windows buildbot.

author: rhuijben
msg: Following up on r34915 and r34917, support commit of a new file of size
Neon has support for large file requests for quite some time, Subversion
should use this support if available.
if LFS is supported. Use 'ne_set_request_body_provider64' for neon
< 0.28. (0.27 broke the ABI of the original function to allow 64

author: kameshj
msg: Un-Propose r34915 as it has been reverted in trunk.

author: kameshj
msg: 0.x releases need not ensure API compatiblity.
0.25 had 'ne_set_request_body_provider64' which has been removed in 0.27.
